name: Genecis Bio
headline: Makes guilt-free plastics from food waste
generated_description:
Genecis Bio is on a mission to revolutionize the way we think about plastics. Founded in Toronto, Canada, in 2017, this innovative company aims to create guilt-free plastics from food waste, effectively addressing one of the most pressing environmental issues of our time: plastic pollution. As a member of the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W20, Genecis combines cutting-edge synthetic biology with a strong commitment to climate solutions.

With a team of about 30 dedicated employees, Genecis Bio focuses on turning organic waste into sustainable, biodegradable materials designed for a circular economy. Their main offerings include environmentally friendly alternatives to single-use plastics, automotive parts, textiles, and medical tools—their PHA (polyhydroxyalkanoates) plastics can biodegrade naturally, helping to reduce the massive amounts of plastic waste that end up in our oceans each year.

The company prides itself on developing bioplastics that not only rival the performance of traditional plastics but also come at a lower cost and with reduced emissions. They work closely with businesses to make the transition to sustainable product offerings easier, ensuring that companies can meet their sustainability goals without sacrificing quality or profitability.

Some noteworthy features of Genecis Bio include:

- **Sustainable Alternatives**: Their bioplastics serve as alternatives to harmful oil-based plastics in various applications such as automotive, packaging, and medical devices.
- **Customized Solutions**: Genecis offers tailored polymer development to meet specific needs for biodegradability and functionality.
- **Partnership Opportunities**: With a forward-thinking approach, they invite collaboration with businesses eager to adopt eco-friendly materials.

For those interested in learning more or partnering with Genecis Bio, you can find more details on their website: [Genecis Bio](https://www.genecis.co/). 

In summary, Genecis Bio is not just another startup in the climate tech space; it's a forward-looking company poised to make a real impact by harnessing the power of waste to create viable products, proving that sustainability and performance can go hand in hand. If you're keen on innovative solutions to combat plastic pollution, Genecis Bio might just be the breakthrough you’ve been waiting for.
